articles.description: Happy Mother’s Day, Alex.
articles.content:
Happy Mothers Day, Alex. 
U.S. womens soccer star Alex Morgan gave birth to her first child earlier this week when Charlie Elena Carrasco entered the world at 11:30 A.M. on Thursday.
Charlie weighed in at 8 pounds and 5 ounces.
